sentences.en: Don't let me hear a single word against your stepmother.
sentences.cn: 别让我听到半句关于你继母的坏话.

sentences.en: Hansel and Gretal's stepmother did not like them at all.
sentences.cn: 汉梭和葛蕾朵的继母一点也不喜欢他们.

sentences.en: He had a sharp - tongued, nagging stepmother.
sentences.cn: 他的继母说话尖刻, 唠叨不休.

sentences.en: He raced to pick up the lifejackets while his stepmother sent out a Mayday call.
sentences.cn: 他的继母发出无线电求救信号的时候，他飞跑着去拿救生衣。

sentences.en: It began when my mother quarrelled with his stepmother and broke us up.
sentences.cn: 自从我母亲跟他继母闹翻以后,我就常常哭.

sentences.en: It was the voice of Madam Chou , Chueh - hui's stepmother , calling from the main building.
sentences.cn: 上房里有人在叫,这是他的继母的声音.

sentences.en: My stepmother was in her element, organizing everything.
sentences.cn: 我的继母得心应手地料理着一切。

sentences.en: She feared losing her inheritance to her stepmother.
sentences.cn: 她担心她继承的遗产会被继母夺走。

sentences.en: She harboured resentment against her stepmother.
She looked at me as if I were the wicked stepmother.
sentences.cn: 她看我的眼神，我简直就是一个恶毒的后母。

sentences.en: She was the stepmother of King Tutankhamen , commonly known as King Tut.
sentences.cn: 娜芙提提还是人称图坦王的图坦卡门国王的继母.

sentences.en: The stepmother and her two step sisters enjoyed making fun of Cinderella.
sentences.cn: 她的继母和两个姐姐总是取笑她.

sentences.en: The two brothers remained to chat with their stepmother.
sentences.cn: 觉新弟兄还留在房里跟周氏谈了些闲话.

sentences.en: They protested to his stepmother, demanding that she scold him.
sentences.cn: 他们有一次居然在他继母的面前批评他的行动, 要她好好管教他.

sentences.en: When she married Tom, she became stepmother to his child.
sentences.cn: 她和汤姆结婚后, 她成了他的孩子的继母.

sentences.en: You see, my stepmother and the children are going North for good, tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 你看, 我那位继母和她的孩子们明天就要回北方定居.

trans.tran_en: a woman who is married to your father but who is not your mother
